## [Monash Letter Template](https://github.com/numbats/monash-quarto-letter)

This is a Quarto template that assists you in creating a letter on
Monash University letterhead.

<table>
<tr><td valign="top">

```
quarto use template numbats/monash-quarto-letter
```

This will install the extension and create an example qmd file that you
can use as a starting place for your letter.

You may also use this format with an existing Quarto project or
document. From the quarto project or document directory, run the
following command to install this format:

```
quarto install extension numbats/monash-quarto-letter
```

</td><td valign="top">
[![](https://github.com/numbats/monash-quarto-letter/raw/main/examples/template.png){width=700}](https://github.com/numbats/monash-quarto-letter)
</td>
</tr>
</table>
